name: Karen Skiles
text: This is a regular spot for me and my daughter when we are out and about on Saturdays. Love this place. Delicious food and fun environment. Staff is wearing masks and you can sit out on the patio or in the extra outdoor tent space.

name: Niv Konforty
text:
The word on the street is that the best pizza in ATL can be found here. Guess what, I just had my first pie today and it was delicious.
I‚Äôm a pizza fan so to please me could be a challenging job but god, finally top ‚Ä¶More

name: Emily Polanco
text: Pizza is absolutely amazing. It's definitely luxury pizza, not like ur prices for your local pizza place, but it's worth it on special occasions.  Our waiter was super helpful for my sister's birthday. Highly recommend.

name: Sally peralez
text: I love Mellow Mushroom pizza and went there for lunch today. The pizza tasted very good but the crust around the outside was not fully cooked and was gummy inside. This was pointed out to the manager who said thanks for telling him and then we were charged full price. This is not a good way to encourage people to keep coming back.

name: Thaismarie Ruiz
text: The BBQ chicken pizza was really good. Everybody of the crew had mask for COVID.

name: Carlette Reese
text: I was very disappointed in my pizza -- and, I usually love Mellow Mushroom. The 2 large pizzas I ordered, had more crust than sauce and cheese! Instead of being spread out towards the edge, it looked as if they used a small paper plate to determine the size/diameter of the sauce and cheese space.

name: Sean Jakucenis
text: food was great, service was good,my grateful dead was amazing. great staff, cool atmosphere.  and quite a few gorgeous women as well. definitely worth going to.

name: Linda Ortiz
text: Food was amazing and came out hot. We had a party of 14 and they were able to accommodate us quickly. However, the service was mediocre at best. We put our own tables together, passed out our own plates, had to circle our items from the ‚Ä¶More

name: Geoffrey Devino - Realtor
text: Great food, great bar, cool atmosphere and awesome staff! We love this place‚úåÔ∏è

name: Vel Hodge
text: Customers Service is OUTSTANDING, and they make you feel at home. EXCEPTIONAL,  go check them out. Thank You  Mellow  Mushroom.

name: Daisy Aguilar
text: Pizza is amazing, but their online ordering system glitches sometimes and erases some of the customizations. The manager didn‚Äôt help accommodate the mistakes made by the ordering system.

name: Scott Taylor
text: Love their specialty pies, and the thin crust is a nice variation. The Suwanee location does a good job.

name: Adam Slide
text: Good pizza, decent prices, kid friendly.  Not the best pizza I've ever had, but it has a unique flavor and it's a step up from most chain places.

name: Rhonda Paradis
text: Burger was excellent!! Came out exactly how I wanted and I would definitely recommend eating here!

name: Tom Westerfield
text: Excellent pizza as always.  One of my family's favorites.

name: Melanie Home
text: So great food and service. This place is fantasticüëå

name: Roy Herrera
text: Service was good. Friendly staff and great selection. Nice restrooms

name: Nick McCulloch
text:
Great Pizza nice atmosphere
The House Special is the way to go

name: Lane Bailey
text: Good pizza. Nice atmosphere. Reasonable service time,

name: Eric Lanier
text: This is no doubt one of the best restaurants in the area. Always when I go there I am absolutely pleased. They keep their high  standard service and the highest level of food  they give. You no doubt will love this place. Very  recommended.

name: Jerry Horn
text:
What a horrible experience. On hold to place a order for 35min.  After they finally decided to help me they tell me they are out of large
but I can pay more for a small and a med. So MM makes their dough, so how are ‚Ä¶More

name: Michael Calhoun
text: Fantastic Service and Pizza cant wait to go back

name: Keegan Donegan
text: Love this Mellow Mushroom location. My orders are always right, the service is more than excellent and friendly, and it‚Äôs always so dang good! Usually I get a large pizza with my favorites like pepperoni, onion, more cheese(although they use plenty), and Italian sausage. Or just pepperoni. Always recommend this location and love it.

name: Sean Motise
text: Pizzas are good quality. They don't have Tabasco sauce. Service is friendly. Great atmosphere.

name: Ryan Sandwich
text: Definitely a great place to grab pizza or a beer.  Whitney is always a great server, whether she is running trivia or just taking care of your table.  There are great vegetarian options also.

name: S C
text: This was my first time visiting this restaurant. It is in the cute shopping center of Old Town Suwanee. It was pretty packed for a Friday evening, but we didn't have to wait very long for our table of four. The hostess was very nice and our ‚Ä¶More

name: Terry Enslow
text: We had a great dinner here with family. All our food was great. We had wings, hoagies, and pizza and everything was fresh and delicious. The service was great too. Friendly servers and quick to get our food and drinks

name: Gaige Martinez
text: Atmosphere is great; even with COVID-19 precautions, Mellow Mushroom still keeps it chill.

name: Bobby Steelz
text: Would like to do zero stars. Highly disappointed. After 5 minutes of the staff arguing who was going to seat my party. I finally had someone tell me there is a waiting list. Mind you my party was the only one there. I was told 25 minutes to ‚Ä¶More

name: MARCIE MOHAMMED
text: Great atmosphere. The kids love it. Our waiter Chris was a delight. They had the cheese pizza and they really enjoyed it. I had the steak hoagie, it was ok.

name: Patrick Puckett
text: Pretzel Bites and fresh pizza, nothing wrong with that.

name: Tracy Osborne
text: Mighty fine pizza.  Pick a house special, or build your own.  Nothing better than a Mellow pizza and a COLD beer.

name: Nitagirl Lovinglife Jefferson
text: My spinach artichoke was Delicious!

name: 1 A
text: This is my favorite pizza place, the staff is courteous and the quality of the pizza is great, I recommend the Great white!

name: Toyin Alonge
text: The food was delicious,  great customer service, friendly casual atmosphere,  and they have  free wifi. Im able to eat and get a little work done!

name: Steve Smith
text: Good food, good service

name: Mickey Stone
text: Mighty meaty. Nuff said!

name: Lauren
text: Great pizza and service was quick. Don't eat pizza often so it was worth the cheat meal.

name: John C
text: Love mellow mushroom pizzas.  They also carry gluten-free pizza.  The cheese and the crust are the best part  of their pizzas.  The parking can be tight over there sometimes.

name: Ian Messamore
text: Great food and atmosphere! The owner, Jill, is great and the bartender/do-it-all Kevin

name: Photo Account
text: The staff was amazing. They were funny, kind, and attentive. I split a calzone with a family member and the serving was still more than enough. The restaurant provides paper straws which are far better for the environment, and handles allergies with knowledge and grace. I would definitely come again.

name: Robyn Monroe
text: Great pizza & location! Wonderful for families. Super friendly staff, too!

name: Heather Bradley
text: Can't say how much we appreciate that Mellow Mushroom allows dogs on the patio even when it's tented off to stay warm in the winter. Was a life saver during a road trip!

name: Bo Castell
text: We have been to different locations and the pizza is consistent and always good. We have tried several different ones and I liked them all. The salads are good. There is a Portobello appetizer that's delicious. Little pricey but good. No complaints.

name: Randy Huffman
text: Great food and service

name: Tawanda L
text: Busy Saturday night. Long wait for food and  my pizza was not right so had to wait more.  Overall pizza was okay. Crust was crunchy, slices were big. Toppings looked fresh.

name: Grant Q
text: I ordered a large pizza today to come in and pick up. 30 minutes later I show up to get the pizza and one of the toppings is wrong. I talked the the manager about paying a discount for the pizza that was incorrect since I am on a time ‚Ä¶More

name: John Yoon
text:
The atmosphere here is great and the food is pretty good too. All the servers are extremely friendly and handle children pretty well.
My wife and I split a veggie calzone and a burger. The Mrs. forgot to add cheese ‚Ä¶More

name: Pat Brown
text: I ordered pizza hold the jalipenos . It came with jalapenos. This happened before, I thought I would give another chance. Another member of our party order the 1 slice of pizza with salad lunch special. It was incorrect.

name: Paolo Garcia
text: One of the best mellow mushroom I have been in! Friendly staff, good food and very clean tables and bathrooms! My only complaint is that the mixed drink I ordered is very very weak in terms of alcohol. I think I ordered the one with coconut, pineapple and I think it was rum or whiskey in it, can't remember the name.

name: T Adkins
text: Food and service top notch!

name: Rosana Sanchez
text: I love Mellow Mushroom. The atmosphere is always nice. It's fun to look around and see how each one is decorated differently. The service is always great. This Mellow Mushroom is no different. We usually call our order in for pick up. ‚Ä¶More

name: jlcox
text: Phenomenal pizza descent beer selection super friendly staff.

name: adam richter
text: Good food , small beer selection , but the kids like it .

name: Justin Mapes
text: Appetizer was forgotten, one kids meal was forgotten, wife's calzone was messed up twice and forgotten appetizer was poorly offered as a substitute, my calzone was messed up only things were accurate and the service was a massive blame game between wait staff, kitchen and manager

name: Marilyn D.
text: We haven't been to Mellow Mushroom in a  time but we decided to grab lunch there.  We were seated immediately and our server was quick and polite. My husband ordered a hoagie and said it had lots of meats on it. It could have had a little ‚Ä¶More

name: Chip A
text: It's good. Sone days are better than others. They could work on their consistency, BUT overall always a solid experience with pretty good pizza. üëçüëçüëçüëç

name: Lindsey Kendrick
text: I just moved right across the street from this mellow mushroom and have been to this location multiple times now. The last time I went I had a slight problem with them giving me the wrong crust on my pizza. They were very nice and fixed it ‚Ä¶More

name: nicola warren
text: The staff and the food was great.  The price is reasonable and the portion is humongous.   Can't wait to visit again.  I went to celebrate a friend birthday.   This restaurant serve vegetarian and vegan meals.

name: Wezz W
text: Good pizza. Great vibe. Clean, well run.

name: Anastasia Jimenez
text: Pizza really good. Service not so pleasant.

name: Joe Stevenson
text: AMAZING food!!!!!!!!!! I‚Äôve been coming here for a while and it‚Äôs the best pizza in the south and Im really snobby about of pizza cuz Im from chicago. But the other day some sus dudes in suits came in and escorted a guy out to talk in the ‚Ä¶More

name: DK1981
text: Great pizza in a hippy-dippy atmosphere. Great to sit outdoors in the evenings with family and friends

name: Bill Dull
text: Crunchy whole wheat pizza

name: Josh Park
text: Pizza is pizza right? No! Mellow mushroom is different. Kids love

name: Dave Palmer
text: The food was good as usual for MM, but our service was not great. The beer selection was lacking. We asked to sit on the patio because the inside was full. Maybe they were understaffed, I'm not sure, but it was not a typical experience compared to other MM restaurants I have visited.

name: Roxanna Rivera
text: Mellow mushroom always has great food and good service. We enjoy seeing the different locations with their own distinctive decor. It is usually full but we like to order and walk around Suwanee Town Center while we wait. I am not a vegetarian but I really liked their Mega Veggie pizza with tofu.

name: Bill Stolze
text: I make it a point to eat here coming into town from the airport. Some of the best pizza I've ever had. Light, airy crust, fresh ingredients, great flavors. I wish they had one in Pittsburgh!

name: Brad Walton
text: It's hard to have a bad pie at the Mellow Mushroom. I wish they sold slices because there's not a good option for kids that are very picky about what they have to have on their pizza but it's a great pie.

name: Wm Barnett
text: No matter which location I go to, MM has the most consistent great pie and customer service of any pizza place.

name: Sarita Wilson
text: So very Good. My Grandchildren, & Friends. Had A Great Time. Food was Great, Service Was Great! Will Definitely Go Again.

name: Mari Vargas
text: The wait staff was great,  atmosphere was cool,  I however was not a fan at all of the meatball sandwich I ordered.  It was bland and tasted as if the meatballs came out of a freezer bag. The meatball didnt even look like actual meat when I ‚Ä¶More

name: Cassandra Blom
text: Service was great and friendly on the patio on mothers day. We got a vegan pizza and vegan veggie calzone to share as a family and they were absolutely delicious. Their crust is vegan, just be sure to say no butter or parmesan or ricotta ‚Ä¶More

name: Macayla H
text: Our fav place to get pizza! The staff is always nice and the atmosphere is cool. Their Holy Shitake Mushroom Pizza is to die for! If you haven't tried it yet, I would totally suggest it. üòª

name: Bobby Patten
text: Iled the house special pizza. Greatlunch spot

name: Michael Johnson
text: Best pizza in town. Always have Bell's Two Hearted on tap.

name: Mildred Gibson
text: Love the food here. One of my favorite local restaurants.

name: Dolores Blalock
text: Delicious food but needs to clean up their outside seating area.

name: Ariel Vines
text: I love Suwanee & this üçï and community are major reasons why! Visit if you have the time. Lots of cool visuals to enjoy while you're there. Don't forget to look up üëÄ‚ô•‚úåüèΩüçÑ

name: Nova Grooms
text: Service is always great, very chill atmosphere. Love coming here when I've got time to catch up and share some good food with friends.

name: David Edens
text: My first time here, won‚Äôt be my last.  Family friendly atmosphere.  A bit noisy but to be expected. Also expect a wait on the weekends so plan ahead.  The prices are are a little higher but you‚Äôre getting what you pay for. The quality is fantastic.

name: Kevin Priger
text: Fun, Friendly, and Family - for an enjoyable dinner this is the place to go in Suwanee

name: Alan Howard
text: Awesome pizza! Great service!

name: Jacob Garn
text: I don't think I've ever had a bad experience at any Mellow Mushroom. My favorite things to get are Holy Shiitake Pie or Tofu Hoagie. Not even vegetarian but I love them.

name: Robert Dentler
text: Great Pizza, beer and friendly staff definitely recommend!

name: CJ Chun
text: Calzone was awesome.

name: Clare
text: Staff is always friendly and consistently knowledgeable when it comes to vegan and non-vegan menu items. And the food is delicious! I've been visiting mellow mushroom locations since long before I was vegan, and I can tell you their food is delicious no matter what!

name: Gayle Antoniak
text: Good pizza! Great service!

name: Apryl Bramlett
text: Always great food and great service!

name: whitney brooks
text: I decided on some drinks and appetizers on the patio. The service was impeccable and I was checked on several times by different employees, including the manager! Highly recommend this location for its wonderful pizza, staff, and park views!

name: Billy Bigballs
text: Food was good. Music was way too loud, couldn't even talk to people at our table

name: Bobby Long
text: Loved this place friendly service great food..

name: Michael Beck
text: Amazing food as always.  They are packed on the weekends as expected but still do their best to seat you fast.  Even better they use your cell phone to tell you when your table is ready so you can wander around the wonderful Suwanee Town ‚Ä¶More

name: Priscilla Noelle Sharp
text: The Pizza is Absolutely the Best and the beer cheese sauce is absolutely amazing

name: JaiFrom TheBronx
text: They no longer have the jerk chicken hoagie on the menu but i asked about it and they cooked it up for me. So yea They're Great!!! Service was outstanding!

name: Zachary Kim
text: Do not go eat at that mellow mushroom, especially with children. The service is bad and they behave like they are in a bar.  Even the manager is rude.  We love mellow mushroom pizza but this location is not worthy to go. Terrible service!!!

name: Danielle Davis
text: Food is great, but Hit or miss with the service here. Sometimes my server is awesome, sometimes I never see them again after getting the food. Also I always seem to get a dirty menu which kinda grosses me out.

name: NaNde K
text: Swiss cheese, bacon burger was awesome.. I modified the Ritz burgerfor my order. Didn't. Care for the baked potatoes that's why they only get 4 stars but the burger was awesome.

name: Buddy Smith
text: Always awesome!

name: sandy mergard
text: Great pizza but a little pricey

name: Eric Oaks
text: This place is amazing. I love the pizza here. The Suwanne town center area is awesome.

name: Bonnie Lewis
text: Best pizza! Awesome service!

name: not mine
text: Good food and selection.  A bit pricy.

name: Collectible John
text: Was busy but no wait. Had the small pizza with pepperoni , mushrooms, and steak slices. Love the new York style baked on the stone pizza. Server was on top of things and kept our drinks full. Great visit.

name: L. W.
text: Love the pizza. So good!

name: Jackson Baughman
text: I go here every Tuesday for trivia night and although this is a pizza place EVERYTHING on this menu is fantastic, the other day I got a burger and even that was one of the best I've had, so you can imagine how their pizza must taste

name: Oakly packers
text: Not my favorite place to be honest. Something about the pizza crust never I quiet right to me.

name: Jason Adams
text: Great place for Authentic real good Pizza. Relaxed atmosphere always. Clean, friendly and well ran Mellow Mushroom located at Suwannee town center. They have all kind of pizza varieties. Our favorite is the House, but they also have allergen free Pizzas. My son likes the Gluten Free with Vegan cheese

name: Robert Bagwell
text: Place is fantastic.  The bartenders and the food is amazing.  Highly recommend checking the place out if you are in the Town Center area!

name: Gary Bak
text: Great pizza.  Good service when dining in and easy option for ordering online and picking it up.  We have been coming here since it opened and other locations long before that.

name: Greg Craft
text: Great service and awesome pizza.

name: Eddie Jones
text: Great pizza and reasonable prices

name: Raj
text:
Best Mellow Mushroom I've ever been to.

name: Hammad Aslam
text: Delicious food!

name: Sean Walker
text: Great pizza a little pricey

name: Pete Lauderdale
text: Friendly staff, Great pizza!

name: Elia Lawrence
text: I enjoy their mushroom soup and all their pizzas.

name: Kate Miley
text: Not great at all. Calzone is flat like a pancake and mostly bread not cheese for $9 + tax unreal suwannee

name: Austin S
text: Good times were had by all.

name: Jan Rossouw
text: Nice restaurant, a little pricey for what it is.  Still enjoy it.

name: Bryan Joyner
text: Great place to take the family for awseome pizza!

name: Pete Lauderdale
text: Great food. Friendly staff!!

name: Curtis Pittman
text: The service was great, as well as the pizza! We had the Mighty Meaty, buffalo chicken,  house specialty, holy shitake, and a pepperoni pizza with mushroom soup and pretzel bites to share around the table.We went with a large party (14) for ‚Ä¶More

name: Diane Sharple Saad
text: Excellent service with large menu.

name: Chiquita C Oden
text: Great atmosphere, great customer service

name: Lewis Karlan
text: Braye provided great service & the Great White pizza was enjoyed. Good quality food. The place was busy, Mellow Mushroom has grown well.

name: Graham Ward
text: Great as always. The atmosphere is clever and cool and the food is delicious as expected

name: Marlane Sobeck
text: New California sandwich. Bread was dry. Sandwich was tiny. Service was good.

name: Andy Blalock
text: I was the the very first customer when they lifted their little flap on their shop on spring street in Atlanta.

name: Alan Schmid
text: You can't go wrong with a 'Shroom, and this place is no exception. Outstanding service, top notch staff and of course incredible food.

name: Donald Smull
text: The staff puts off a video like you're bothering them, and they can't wait for you to leave.

name: LaTasha D
text: Best pizza ever from this chain. Great service. Great setting.  We will be back.

name: Amy Pfaffman
text: Good pizza and salad, and they offer vegan cheese.

name: Tina Velez
text: Always pleasant no matter who we have as a server. Food is fast and hot and tastes fantastic.

name: Cynthia Smith
text: We had pizza, calzones, sandwiches, appetizers and childrens meals. This place rocks. Everything came out together, hot and delicious. Definitely going back.

name: Joseph Wheeler
text: Great pizza, friendly staff

name: Lena Griffin
text: NOT a real Mellow Mushroom.  Nothing but posers playing hippies.  Not one probably knows who Jerry Garcia is.  All the tables full of kids watching iPads while their suburban moms talk shallow.   They close at 9.  Close at 9???

name: Marie Watson
text: This is probably the fourth time here and the service has been hit or miss. Elaine was our server today and she was on top of her game. Prompt and friendly. She checked on us several times. The food was good. I recommend the Parmesan pretzels.

name: S C
text: Best Mellow Mushroom I‚Äôve been to!

name: Barbara J
text: I really like this location. I've been eating at MM for about 30 years now, and this location is pretty consistent. They are very busy, and on a weekend night you can expect to wait at least 30-40 minutes for a pickup order. ‚Ä¶More

name: whitney ocallaghan
text: Absolutely delicious food. Can be crowded and take a while to get your order, based on the time if day. They changed their menu after having a few specialty pies for a long time. They will accommodate if you still want a kind not on the menu.

name: Elizabeth Britt
text: The small salad was surprisingly large! The bruschetta was delicious too!

name: Tonia Mann
text: Vege Calzone can't be beat!

name: Cindy Castell
text: Greek salad is amazing and a simple cheese pizza is heavenly. One of my favorite pizza spots. Everyone is super nice here too. Even had a balloon guy walking around that day which made my lil girl's day.

name: Karis Jacobstein
text: Great food and staff. They are a staple in the community and do great events with charities. I love the times that the kids with special needs from Happy Feat help out serving. So fun. The only thing that keeps it from getting 5 stars is that it often smells like a frat house the morning after a party (stale beer).

name: Colin Cassuto
text: Great atmosphere and tasty pizza.

name: Eve Prevatte
text: Busy on a Friday night. Unorganized hostesses. Drank and ate at bar. Ok bar service. Pizza was on point. Beer was cold. Decent not awesome. Staff seemed bored to tears.

name: Tessa Aguero Torregrosa
text: Wow I don't have words to say the great employees has this place. Beatiful place inside of Town  Center in Suwanee.

name: Courtney Delsin
text: Manager (Kevin) was very friendly and helpful! Food is great and I love the fact that they have vegan pizza now.

name: Kelvin
text: Pizza was great as usual. However, they need to improve their website's online ordering and order pick up. The website ordering need to be revamped and less cumbersome. The scheduled pick up time was not met and there is no waiting area. ‚Ä¶More

name: Luis Soto
text: Waited at the entrance for 10 minutes to be even looked at.  2 people came to the front and we weren't even asked if someone had helped.  Empty tables and booths everywhere so they weren't busy.  Can't say anything about the food as we left ‚Ä¶More

name: Jason Marlowe
text: Cool location. Very busy at lunchtime. Wish take it was faster. Ordered a slice to go and it took 20 minutes. Still delicious. Just figured if they offered pizza by the slice it should be a little faster.

name: Zoe Fleming
text: Delicious üòã

name: Liane Wagner
text: Staff is always great! I wish they served better vegan cheese, cashew-based is the best. I'll only get salads here bc of the lack of good vegan pizza cheese.

name: Jonathan Brewer
text: Pizza was good. Drove 30 minutes to get a holy shittake and some pretzel bites with beer cheese. Got all the way home I realized there was no beer cheese.

name: Lorrin Magill
text: Standard Mellow Mushroom.  Meet some friends there for dinner, ended up being trivia night.  But that was a lot of fun.  I would recommend!

name: Jackie Clark
text: Only two stars because service was extremely slow getting pizza made and out to customers. It was so bad I lost my appetite. The servers did their best coming to check on you.

name: Luigi Rosa
text: Nice place to have pizza with friends. Very good beers

name: Tete
text: Cool friendly staff, fast and professional

name: Sabrina
text: We love the jerk chick sammich but it's not on the menu but if you ask for the"old school jerk chicken"  they don't have a problem making it.

name: Mikaela Pearce
text: Our food was alright but our waitress was awesome even though it was really busy

name: Bill Rabara
text: Wow. Can‚Äôt believe this is chain pizza. Pepperoni, meatballs, and green pepper pizza was deliciouss. Ranks just below Manco and Manco pizza in New Jersey among chain pizza restaurants and that is saying something. Dine in atmosphere is inviting and cool.

name: Mike Arnold
text: Great pizza. Fun atmosphere and good service.

name: Sara Poe
text: Love their pizza and calzone

name: John Pomeroy
text: So far the best pizza i have had anywhere GA. They make a killer buffalo pizza.

name: Amairani Izucar
text: The house special was my favorite! Made to order and the crust was so crunchy; the perfect crunch. Will be back for more :)

name: Alan McElroy
text:
Good food.
Great service

name: Ronald Garlicki
text: Great pizza. Only do carry out so can't talk about the service. They are quick and the pizza gas great flavor. Best in area.

name: Lucky Charmz
text: Kind of small, but the staff was nice and our pizzas were made with love

name: Deron Smithwick
text: Pizza is very good nice diverse crowd,  just love the crust. We had Zac as our server a really cool dude. We ordered Mighty meat and a Cheese pizza. The pizza was decent size or three people we were able to get about  slices each. Good Pizza good service we will go again.

name: Chariss Newsom
text: Though this location has changed a lot in the past few years, the food is still excellent. Just like you'd expect from a Mellow Mushroom. The staff is also great. Very friendly and helpful.

name: J Casablanca
text: Best calzones around!

name: Shreyas Ramnarayan
text: Great service and pizzas !

name: Rebecca Barr
text: The staff was very accommodating and friendly.  Fun atmosphere.  And pizza was delicious!

name: Jett
text: Food was decent. Our server was making sexual jokes to the female server and it made me and my friends feel really uncomfortable. Then he came and was saying that he does that a lot so it was fine. It was really weird and off-putting.

name: Jeremy Williams
text: Pizza is amazing and very fast service

name: Nicholas G Johnson
text: Great pizza, creative menu

name: John Ginzo
text: I just picked up a pizza and garlic bread order.  I tried them again. Wasnt crazyr about them last year when I ordered last and not much has changed.  This is not bad pizza. But if  you are expecting authentic NY style pizza, this is not ‚Ä¶More

name: Eric Trieu
text:
Very average pizza place. Nothing too special here.
The food was okay and it was a quick easy stop for lunch. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brian Martin
text: Great service,  and food match

name: Serina Nations
text: Best pizza hands down! Such a fun place & it's local too! Kaitlyn & Aimee are the best 'tenders around! üçª We'll miss you Kaitlyn! Good luck in your endeavors sweet girl!

name: Carolyn
text: Food & service was great!

name: Melissa Williams
text: Love the pizza and the outdoor seating.

name: Aliyah Gazur
text: Place was small and great! Good food, good drinks and such a great waitress we had!

name: Cassie Tidwell
text: I have been to this restaurant since it opened. It has always been satisfactory, fun, and mellow. The room is decorated with lava lamps and the music is perfect for my new age taste. The pizza has always come out just right, always had ‚Ä¶More

name: kay yon
text: Awesome place to enjoy a deep dish! Their wide and open restaurant gives you space to either enjoy a pie indoors or in their beautiful patio. It gets a little crowded sometimes, but they still manage it all!

name: Brian Lowers
text: Tried it twice and both times it was was over cooked. Pretty sure it's off the lunch list.

name: Thomas Grey
text: Great pizza, calzones, and even vegan friendly. There is something here for even the most picky family member.

name: Russ and Denise Austin
text: Very good pizza and service.

name: Genna Sabin
text: I like to come here with my friend and we always have the best time and the pizza is really good. Me and  my friend always get the appetizer of the garlic knots. I really like Mellow Mushroom and I am most likely to return.

name: Neiva Herrera
text: Food was great service was good too!!!

name: Avatar Yang
text: Pizza so good.

name: Sarah Welch
text: It's expensive if you get a specialty pizza, but the service was fast, good, and efficient. (Of course, we got there right before the dinner rush started.) I have always liked this location, and I would recommend it to people who like strange pizzas. My favorite is the Red Skin Potato Pie.
